thread.section_title: Hotel Turenne Le Marais - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect location
thread.title_full: Perfect location - Review of Hotel Turenne Le Marais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Philip316
title: Perfect location
text:
The Turenne Le Marais was the perfect spot to enjoy Paris from. We had a very roomy triple with two rooms for my wife and I and our college age daughter.
The staff was friendly and helpful and the hotel comfortable and reasonably priced through agoda
The absolute best part of the hotel is the location. Right in le marais near the park le Vosges it was great to walk the streets of Paris
The nearby restaurant options are fantastic and there are cafes around for dessert or a evening drink as well
